bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: kdevelop-php-5.0.0-1.fc24 requires "kdevelop = 9:5.0", but the new kdevelop-9:5.0.0-1.fc24 provides "kdevelop = 9:5.0.0-1.fc24", which doesn't seem to match by dnf rules.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): kdevelop-php-5.0.0-1.fc24
How reproducible: readily
Steps to Reproduce: 1. install kdevelop & kdevelop-php 5.0.0-0.3.20160808git.fc24.x86_64 2. dnf upgrade --best
Actual results: Error: nothing provides kdevelop = 9:5.0 needed by kdevelop-php-5.0.0-1.fc24.x86_64
Expected results: upgraded kdevelop-php
Additional info: It looks as though the Requires stems from these lines in the spec which were not updated along with kdevelop: %define kdevelop_ver 5.0 Requires: kdevelop = 9:%{kdevelop_ver}
*** Bug 1375052 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
